text: Milovan Minja Prelević (28 February 1970 – 1 August 2019) was a Montenegrin football coach and player. Milovan´s football career started in the FK Kom from Podgorica. Later on he played in FK Crvena Stijena, FK Budućnost, OFK Belgrade and FK Obilić. Milovan played for youth national team of Montenegro. He stops with the active playing football quite early and becomes devoted to the coaching instead. His coaching job starts at FK Budućnost. He even worked in OFK Petrovac, FK Kom, FK Mladost, Montenegro U-19 national team and Hajer FC. He was coach with UEFA PRO license and lecturer at the UEFA school of coaches of Montenegro. On August 1, 2019, Prelević was found dead at his apartment at the age of 49. ==References== ==Other websites== * Milovan Minja Prelevic at FK Mladost * Milovan Minja Prelevic at Picore Category:1970 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Montenegrin footballers
title: Milovan Minja Prelević
